articles.content: Indian benchmark indices are likely to open in the green on Monday as suggested by trends in SGX Nifty which indicate a gap-up opening for the index in India with a 107 points gain. The BSE Sensex on… [+4074 chars]

articles.author: Sameer Contractor
articles.title: Hero MotoCorp Extends Plant Shutdown Till May 16, 2021 - carandbike
articles.description: Hero MotoCorp had originally announced the shutdown from April 22 to May 1, which was later extended to May 9. However, with the Covid cases still on the rise, the shutdown has been extended till May 16, 2021.
articles.content: Hero MotoCorp has announced that it will be extending the temporary closure of its manufacturing plans and other facilities across the country till May 16, 2021. The company had originally announced … [+1606 chars]
